Package javelin.controller.action.target

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MeleeTarget
    Human-friendly version of the MeleeAttack AiAction, to be used internally.
    RangedTarget
    Gives a human-usable version of the RangedAttack AiAction.
    Target
    Base class for all actions involving selecting an unit as target.
